profile.greeting: Welcome to Covid-19 WIKI Bot. We provide helpful information about the Corona Virus.

get_started.welcome: Hi {{userFirstName}}! Welcome to Covid-19 WIKI Bot. We provide helpful information about the Corona Virus.
get_started.guidance: All information presented here is pulled from the WHO website.
get_started.help: Please ALWAYS use the menu buttons below to navigate the Wiki Bot. Click the FAQs to see the Infection Numbers.

curation.prompt: Studies to date suggest that the virus that causes COVID-19 is mainly transmitted through contact with respiratory droplets rather than through the air.
curation.subtitle: Wash hands often
curation.occasion: The buttons below present you a variety of options that span across activities that could help you in this stay at home period.
curation.be-smart: Be Smart, Help Reduce the spread
curation.price: Kindly answer as appropriately as you can and then if there's a need the local CDC will be contacted. Thank you.
curation.fine: You are in the clear. Let's go back to the FAQs
curation.symptoms: Do you have any of the following symptoms: cough, sore throat, congestion, or runny nose?
curation.fever: Do you have a fever or body aches and did you have flu-like symptoms at the same time with at least 4 other people, after having been to the same place in the past week?
curation.travel: Have you traveled abroad in the last Six weeks?
curation.crowd: Do you work with tourist or have to stay in crowded place or have to meet with a lot of people and visit ny public place such as market, hospital, public transportation in the past six weeks?
curation.contact: Have you ever been in physical contact with anyone who has diagnosed with having a COVID-19?
curation.protect: It is highly emphasized at this time to stay at home to avoid getting infected and thus reducing the spread. You can click on the link below to

order.prompt: We'll be happy to help you. Select from the following
order.number: Sure, please write the order number
order.status: Your order is on it’s way, expect to have it in 3 days.

care.prompt: Coronaviruses are a large family of viruses which may cause illness in animals or humans.  In humans, several coronaviruses are known to cause respiratory infections ranging from the common cold to more severe diseases such as Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS) and Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS). The most recently discovered coronavirus causes coronavirus disease COVID-19.
care.covid-19: COVID-19 is the infectious disease caused by the most recently discovered coronavirus. This new virus and disease were unknown before the outbreak began in Wuhan, China, in December 2019.
care.symptoms-19: The most common symptoms of COVID-19 are fever, tiredness, and dry cough. Some patients may have aches and pains, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat or diarrhea. These symptoms are usually mild and begin gradually. Some people become infected but don’t develop any symptoms and don't feel unwell. Most people (about 80%) recover from the disease without needing special treatment. Around 1 out of every 6 people who gets COVID-19 becomes seriously ill and develops difficulty breathing. Older people, and those with underlying medical problems like high blood pressure, heart problems or diabetes, are more likely to develop serious illness. People with fever, cough and difficulty breathing should seek medical attention.
care.issue: Hi {{userFirstName}}, my name is {{agentFirstName}}, I'm here to assist you with any questions you might have about {{topic}}.
care.default: {{userFirstName}}, my name is {{agentFirstName}}, I'm here to assist you today. How can I help you?
care.style: {{userFirstName}}. Please, it is important to understand that you should only contact the CDC for Critical Issues ONLY.
care.check: Kindly use the button below to check for your symptoms before you contact the your Local CDC. You can click the other button should you decide to.

chat_plugin.prompt: Thanks for visiting our store, be sure to check out all the great styles we have on the summer section.

fallback.attachment: Thanks for sending this attachment, we can connect you to an agent to review it or we can start over
